name: The Walls
description:
Climb the wall and collect points while shooting evil wizards and dodging bullets; those were the dark ages... right?

Tip: you can't shoot and move at the same time
Modes: there are endless and time trial modes, try getting the highest score in both
Controls: w or up arrow to move, mouse to aim and left mouse button to shoot

Update
I released a fixed version, which will get bug fixes and other updates. Check it out if you're interested :)
